instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-4924: What is 820-4924? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.

threads.title: [SOLVED]<LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-4924</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> Trackpad/Keyboard issue
threads.message:
I have this <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-4924</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> with Trackpad/Keyboard not functioning properly. They are both working some of the time and suddenly freeze up. There are always clicking on the trackpad but both trackpad and keyboard works sporadically.  I haven' got schematics or boardview for this and I don't even know if they exist for us to get hold of. Are there schematics for this board? Power button on keyboard works all the time.

The board was water damaged but I can't see any corrosion on it, only one red sensor.

threads.title: [SOLVED]<LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-4924</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> Trackpad/Keyboard issue
[SOLVED]<LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-4924</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> Trackpad/Keyboard issue
threads.message: I wish I had one, I have ordered both from eBay but it will probably take weeks to arrive

threads.title: [SOLVED]<LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-4924</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> Trackpad/Keyboard issue
threads.message: The cable is prone to failure. Wait for the cable to arrive.

threads.title: [SOLVED]<LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-4924</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> Trackpad/Keyboard issue
threads.message: Thank you, I wiggled a bit on the cable and you are probably right because right now it is working.

threads.title: [SOLVED]<LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-4924</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> Trackpad/Keyboard issue
threads.message: Got the new cable yesterday, works fine now :)
